meanings.definition: Immature soybeans in the pod, typically boiled or steamed and served as a snack or appetizer.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy snacking on edamame while watching movies.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served edamame as an appetizer before the main course.
meanings.sent3: The edamame pods told jokes to each other while waiting to be cooked.
meanings.sent4: The edamame pods were like little surprises waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of edamame pods made them look like tiny jewels.
